label: specifiedFinancialAccount
comment: A creditor financial account specified for this trade settlement payment means.
A debtor financial account specified for this cross-border regulatory procedure.
The creditor financial account, used for crediting, specified for this financing summary document.
The creditor financial account, used for crediting, specified for this requesting party.

rangeIncludes.comment: A specific business arrangement whereby credits arising from transactions are recorded.

domainIncludes.comment: A collection of financing related data that provides an overview of key points.
Details of the means by which the payment will be or has been made.
A set of formal steps to satisfy a regulation, law or convention.
An individual, a group, or a body having a role as a requestor.
